title: EasyFOTA agent metadata schema
description: This schema formalizes the metadata JSON file used by EasyFOTA throughout its processes

product.description: The id of the product that will be updated. It must be a hexadecimal number of 64 digits

version.description: Version of the software installed on device AFTER updating

supported-hardware.description: A list of objects describing the update hardware targets

changelog.description: An URL for a text file containg the changelog between the current version and the new version
